item.title: Case Study: Rav Kav Public Transportation App
item.description:
Case Study: Rav Kav Public Transportation App

and public transportation apps around the world Public transportation systems around the world have been issuing fancy new plastic cards that store all your fares, and getting rid of the old paper tickets, and Israel is no different. 'Rav Kav' is the system used in Israel.

item.title: Rav Kav Concept Design
item.description:
Rav Kav Concept Design

These are really annoying problems and no different to what we have in Israel with the Rav Kav system. So as a side project I presented myself with a challenge.

item.title: The Future of the Telephone Call
item.description:
The Future of the Telephone Call

What can the future be holding on the other line? Throughout the day our phones are constantly ringing, ringing with text messages, FaceTime, voice notes, Facebook messengers, and snapchats, ringing with anything but an incoming call.

item.title: Augmented Sound
item.description:
Augmented Sound

Augmented Reality (AR), not to be confused with Virtual Reality or Glass, is the idea of taking this digital world and introducing it to us in our real world in context.

item.title: Second Skin
item.description:
Second Skin

This is something that I have been obsessed with for a while, but just recently this came up in a conversation with a friend and I wanted to explore it a little bit further.
